name: GreedyKarts
description:
Greedy Karts

An arcade game unlike anything you've played. Its you against an NPC that has been trained using Machine Learning. The game is set in an arcade world. Where you will battle against the agent in a quest to reach the destination before it does. The first to 16 wins it all.

This game also features Speech Recognition. You are able to control your player using the following phrases: "UP" "DOWN" "LEFT" "RIGHT". You can say "Play" to start the game in the menu and "Quit" at the end scenes to quit the game. 

Let the fight being! 

V.A.R. Gaming 

Rawinder Singh
